title: Taiyah voice overlapping itself
body: So, I've been playing Taliyah for the last few days, and I've noticed that at times, she'll say voice lines either too closely to each other when compared to other champions, or will just say one on top of the other.  It happens frequently in game, but I'm not sure how to record it.  While I'm not sure if it's really a bug, or maybe a glitch, I figured I should report it you nonetheless, b/c I found it to be a little bothersome; I enjoy listening to the champions speak when I play them, especially when they have a voice I enjoy a lot.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! I know a couple sound designers are looking into this. :)
Awesome, great to know!  Thanks so much for the update.  :)
